extendedInfo.description: This is an Text File Converter to handle conversion of the text file line ending across diffrent OS platform.It can do the text file conversion between with Dos/Windows and Unix/Android,also between with Mac and Unix/Android.This is the Android version of the classic utility of Dos2Unix and Unix2Dos.Features:1)Support Dos/Window,Unix/Linux/Android And Mac2)Automatically skips binary and non-regular files3)Keep original file dates option4)Have Overwrite and New File Mode.More features will be coming,any feedbacks will be  appriciate.
